scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); for (const p of ['.next','.next-dev','tsconfig.tsbuildinfo']) fs.rmSync(p,{ recursive:true, force:true });"
scripts.doctor:node:
node -e "const major=Number(process.versions.node.split('.')[0]); const allow=process.env.DEEPH_ALLOW_UNSUPPORTED_NODE==='1'; if (major >= 24 && !allow) { console.error('

[deeph-site] Se quiser forcar mesmo assim: DEEPH_ALLOW_UNSUPPORTED_NODE=1 npm run dev
'); process.exit(1); } if (major >= 24 && allow) { console.warn('
[deeph-site] Rodando em Node 24 por override. Se houver erro de chunk/cache, volte para Node 20.
'); }"
